page.title: 09FARMING AND RECREATION
page.content: As the majority of the people surveyed in the area are farmers they find little time to enjoy many activities after their long working days. This is particularly so in the Spring and Summer months when they might enjoy one or two days break only to visit an Agricultural Show. The non-farming community have varied hobbies ranging from Shooting, Fishing, Walking to Sailing. Flying is enjoyed by two people in the area involving a round trip of l26 miles to the Mona Flying School on the Isle of Anglesey. In the Winter months reading is the main leisure with time also available for playing popular games such as draughts ludo,and cards with the children. Computers and software are now becoming very popular with the adults as well as the children.
